actores: Robert Downey Jr., Chris Evans, Chris Hemsworth
descrip: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together and learn to fight as a team if they are to stop the mischievous Loki and his alien army from enslaving humanity...

actores: Chris Evans, Samuel L. Jackson, Scarlett Johansson
descrip: As Steve Rogers struggles to embrace his role in the modern world, he teams up with a fellow Avenger and S.H.I.E.L.D agent, Black Widow, to battle a new threat...
